info.name: Kantin App API
info.description: API collection for the Kantin App system that allows online food ordering in a school canteen.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for registration, login, and token management

response.name: Successful Registration
Validation Error

request.description: Register a new stan (food stall) account
Logout and invalidate the current token

item.name: Stan Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing stan (food stall) details

response.name: Successful Update
Not a Stan Admin
